availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas H. Barnes (Irvine, Kentucky, student and soldier.)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, student and soldier. Irvine, Kentucky, native. Son of Sidney M. Barnes and Elizabeth Barnes. Student in Estill County, Kentucky in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Estill County in 1850. Resident in Estill County in 1860. Household owned ten enslaved persons in Estill County in 1860. Served in 47th Regiment Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private and major from August 25, 1863 to December 26, 1864.

ab.bibl:
